properties.entry: INSERT INTO ADOPT_REVIEW ( ARLIST_NO , MEM_NO , NICKNAME , AR_TITLE , AR_CONTENT ) VALUES ( SEQ_ARNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? )
